feed.title: Category: In the press | Belgian Bitcoin Association

entry.title: Association mentioned on CoinDesk
entry.content: The Belgian Bitcoin Association was mentioned in the recent CoinDesk article regarding the scientific conference organized at the ULB. In the article, Arne Brutschy explains the reason why the organizers decided to accept bitcoin for conference registrations.

entry.title: L'Echo extended feature on bitcoin
entry.content: Extended feature in L'Echo about usage of bitcoin in Belgium and abroad. Jérémie Dubois-Lacoste and Jean Wallemacq interviewed. The bitcoin protocol is discussed as well.

entry.title: The MtGox crisis
entry.content:
De Tijd writes about the MtGox crisis. Thomas Spaas answers a few questions.

L'Echo writes about the MtGox crisis and the intact confidence of the Belgian Bitcoin community. Jean Wallemacq voices the stance of the Belgian Bitcoin Association.

entry.title: Thomas Spaas at Flemish Investor Federation
entry.content: Thomas Spaas talks about Bitcoin myths, reality, hurdles & opportunities at Flemish Investor Federation.

entry.title: Thomas Spaas interview on Dogecoin
entry.content: Interview of Thomas Spaas on dogecoin at the radio 1 show De ochtend.
